name: Dodge n' Jump
description:
You're a duck, and this time, you gotta play dodge ball with the geese (and jump rope at the same time?!)
Dodge the thrown balls while you jump rope as long as possible before you're out!

Credits:
Brian Quintero - Gameplay Programmer
Kiara Yupangco - Sprite & UI Artist
----------------

Sounds:
Music: Sports FM by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/
Dodgeball sound effect - www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKTkLyAduP0
Various duck and geese sounds - zapsplat.com
